title: The Best Early Black Friday Fashion Deals - According to a Shopping Expert
description: Is there anything better than finding (read: falling in love with) a new handbag or trendy pair of sneakers, then discovering that the same product is also on sale at a fraction of its usual cost? Even after years of working as a shopping editor, I know firsthand that the "stars aligned" feeling of finding a dream style at the right price never really goes away - especially come Black Friday, when the season's most coveted wardrobe essentials are often marked down at their lowest prices of the year. While we're still a few weeks out from 2024's biggest shopping day, many retailers are getting in the holiday spirit early, with Black Friday sales that span the entire month of November and encompass a range of products. J.Crew is offering up to 50 percent off styles sitewide, including cozy sweaters and cardigans. Forever 21's early Black Friday sale is live, where shoppers can take 30 percent off trendy fashion staples - like faux-leather coats and evening bags. And even Amazon unveiled a bevy of new fashion markdowns on its bestselling clothing - including editor-loved bodysuits and Levi's jeans. Regardless of what you're in the market for, you can save big on it right now. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best early Black Friday fashion deals. Looking for something specific? Jump to our specific categories below: Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Winter Jackets Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories Update on November 13, 2024 at TK: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations.
author: Kyley Warren
text: Anthropologie | Forever 21 / MadewellPhoto Illustration: Kyley WarrenAnthropologie | Forever 21 / MadewellPhoto Illustration: Kyley WarrenWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Is there anything better than finding (read: falling in love with) a new handbag or trendy pair of sneakers, then discovering that the same product is also on sale at a fraction of its usual cost? Even after years of working as a shopping editor, I know firsthand that the "stars aligned" feeling of finding a dream style at the right price never really goes away ‚Äî especially come Black Friday, when the season's most coveted wardrobe essentials are often marked down at their lowest prices of the year. While we're still a few weeks out from 2024's biggest shopping day, many retailers are getting in the holiday spirit early, with Black Friday sales that span the entire month of November and encompass a range of products. J.Crew is offering up to 50 percent off styles sitewide, including cozy sweaters and cardigans. Forever 21's early Black Friday sale is live, where shoppers can take 30 percent off trendy fashion staples ‚Äî like faux-leather coats and evening bags. And even Amazon unveiled a bevy of new fashion markdowns on its bestselling clothing ‚Äî including editor-loved bodysuits and Levi's jeans. Regardless of what you're in the market for, you can save big on it right now. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best early Black Friday fashion deals. Looking for something specific? Jump to our specific categories below: Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Winter Jackets Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories Update on November 13, 2024 at TK: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations.PS Photography | Renee RodriguezEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersMangopop Square Neck Long Sleeve Bodysuit ($20, originally $36) There are popular Amazon styles, and then there are downright beloved pieces ‚Äî this bodysuit falls into the latter category. It's stylish yet simple, comfortable yet form-fitting, and made from a stretchy cotton and spandex blend that feels high-end, yet is still totally affordable. See how one PS editor styled the bodysuit in this Amazon bodysuits review. Editor Quote: "The elasticity is flawless and makes for the most perfect fit. It's tight and form-fitting but hugs in all the right places. I love the square neckline, and the long sleeves make it the perfect pairing with jeans for fall. This bodysuit looks extremely similar to a bodysuit I've been eyeing that costs over $100, which makes me so happy I stumbled across this one because it's a fraction of the price." ‚Äî Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social produceramazon.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersKidmi Suede Clogs ($40, originally $50) These suede clogs are the epitome of fall style, with a traditional cork design that provides full support and unflinching durability. The shoes have an average 4.3 rating on Amazon, along with thousands of rave reviews that speak to their comfortable yet luxurious feel. Plus, they're one of many pieces currently marked down at Amazon's early Black Friday sale.baublebar.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersBaubleBar Bubble Initial Necklace ($46, originally $58) Treat yourself or the fashion-lover in your life to a statement necklace with a custom twist. This initial pendant can be customized directly through BaubleBar's site, and it has a cool bubble design that's so on trend this season. Shoppers can take 20 percent off the accessory through BaubleBar's early Black Friday sale, with the discount applied at checkout.amazon.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on BestsellersHappy Sailed Knit Dress ($47, originally $70) While sweater dresses often have a tendency to be big and bulky, this knit style stands out with its fitted design and wrap silhouette. The tie-detailing makes it easy to adjust, ensuring a universally flattering fit across a range of body types. Best of all, you can wear it for so many different occasions without feeling underdressed or too over the top.jcrew.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and SweatersJ.Crew Rollneck Sweater ($48, originally $98) No winter wardrobe is complete with a statement sweater, and this cardinal-red piece is one of my favorites. Unlike turtlenecks, this style has a low rollneck design that offers enough coverage to keep you warm without feeling too constricting up top. It's available in seven fun shades, so it's easy to shop out your perfect match.abercrombie.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and SweatersAbercrombie Collarless Tweed Jacket ($70, originally $140) Ahead of Black Friday, Abercrombie just added dozens of cute pieces to its sale section ‚Äî including this striped tweed jacket, which just oozes an elegant flair. The piece offers so much styling versatility, whether you want to dress it down with jeans and loafers or style it up with boots and a cropped leather skirt for the most robust evening look.shopcider.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on BottomsCider Woven Houndstooth High Waist Mini Skirt ($11, originally $16) Houndstooth feels so synonymous with the fall and winter seasons, which is probably why this leggy skirt is so high on my shopping wishlist. It's great for tapping into the corpcore trend in an elevated yet accessible way. Plus, it's now 31 percent off at Cider's early Black Friday sale.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on BottomsLevi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans ($31, originally $80) Leave it to Levi's to design one of the most comfortable pairs of jeans on the market ‚Äî with the PS editor seal of approval, no less. Regardless of your preferred jean silhouette, these denim pants have a universally flattering design that works across a range of body types. Our own editor even raved about these Levi's jeans in this review of the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans. Editor Quote: "Not to sound like a broken record, but what I love most about the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans is their comfort. They're stretchy, high-waisted, and slightly cropped, landing at the ankle. They're just rigid enough to have structure but soft enough that I look forward to slipping into them at the start of the day. They've become the It girl of my denim collection because they go with everything and are reliably comfortable." ‚Äî Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shoppingaloyoga.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on BottomsAlo 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging ($89, originally $128) Ever dreamed of wearing the same workout essentials as Kendall and Kylie Jenner? Well, you're in luck. The sisters have been spotted wearing these cult-favorite Alo leggings on a number of occasions, and shoppers generally love the athletic pant for its sculpting design that keeps everything pulled in ‚Äî while also giving your booty a subtle lift.freepeople.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on DressesFree People Long Game Tunic Layer ($30, originally $78) Comfort is the name of the game this time of year, and what better style to add to your wardrobe than a breezy dress that fits like an oversize T-shirt? This Free People tunic is primed for lounging, with a flowy silhouette that's easy to move around in ‚Äî and available in two colorways.anthropologie.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on DressesBy Anthropologie V-Neck Velvet Mini Dress ($100, originally $188) Holiday-party season will be here before you know it, which is why now is the perfect time to invest in a glitzy frock you can wear for all types of occasions and dress codes. Whether it's an office party or family gathering, this golden mini dress is the epitome of sophistication, with a velvet composition that's so soft. Shop the piece ‚Äî and plenty of other styles ‚Äî on sale at Anthropologie ahead of Black Friday.forever21.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and CoatsForever 21 Faux Leather Tie-Waist Trench Coat ($35, originally $50) Leather coats might have a reputation for being expensive, but this faux-leather style proves you can tap into the sleek trend without having to break your budget. It's equipped with a sash belt that's removable, so you can adjust and style the piece however you see fit. Plus, it's now marked down at Forever 21's early Black Friday sale.macys.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and CoatsLauren Ralph Lauren Quilted Coat ($110, originally $225) Catch me donning this quilted Ralph Lauren coat all season long. The layer is crafted from an insulated polyester and faux-leather material that's designed to keep you feeling warm in even the coldest winter temperatures ‚Äî sans the usual bulky fit that comes with down jackets.madewell.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and CoatsMadewell Boiled Wool Sweater Shirt Jacket ($170, originally $198) Is it a shirt? Is it a jacket? This unique layer combines the appeal of both pieces into one singular style that doubles as the perfect essential for transitional weather. You can wear it buttoned up on its own or teamed with a lightweight T-shirt underneath; the options are endless.dsw.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on ShoesSteve Madden Laurely Chelsea Bootie ($45, originally $109) If you're looking for a staple boot to don throughout the rest of the season, look no further than this Steve Madden Chelsea Boot ‚Äî a classic silhouette with endless street appeal. For as stylish as the boot is, it's also incredibly functional, with a padded foot bed that provides more support (and comfort!) than traditional ankle boots. nordstrom.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on ShoesAdidas Gender Inclusive Samba OG Sneaker ($60, originally $100) Hailed as the signature soccer shoe, Adidas Sambas sneakers have found new life this season in the streetwear category; everyone from Hailey Bieber to Bella Hadid has been spotted in the silhouette. Best of all, these classic sneakers are now marked down at Nordstrom's early Black Friday sale, so you can scoop them up at a fraction of their usual cost.madewell.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on ShoesMadewell The Greta Ballet Flat ($80, originally $98) It doesn't get much more timeless than a ballet flat. Whether you're styling them with wide-leg jeans, satin skirts, or sweater dresses, these flats from Madewell can be paired with virtually everything in your closet ‚Äî making them the ultimate investment shoe.forever21.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on AccessoriesForever 21 Square Frame Sunglasses ($7, originally $10) These frame sunglasses are the perfect dupe for other designer styles and cost less than $10 ‚Äî what's not to love? You can treat yourself to a fun new accessory or gift them as a stylish stocking stuffer.anthropologie.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on AccessoriesAnthropologie Pearl Drop Earrings ($40, originally $54) When you're not sure what to gift that person who has everything, I find that jewelry is always a safe bet. Case in point: these pearl drop earrings, which are a bit more elevated than a traditional pair of hoops, but still have a lightweight design that ensures they won't feel too heavy while you're wearing them.saksoff5th.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on AccessoriesUgg Shearling Bucket Hat ($96, originally $160) Who says cozy Ugg styles have to be relegated to just boots and slippers? This shearling bucket hat mirrors the composition of the brand's famously cozy shoes, with a floppy frame that fits a variety of head sizes. Shop it in a chestnut or black coloring, and score it on sale at Saks Fifth Avenue's early Black Friday sale. (Use the code COLD40 to get 40 percent off.)nordstrom.comEarly Black Friday Fashion Deals on AccessoriesKurt Geiger London Bond Croc Embossed Leather Shoulder Bag ($179, originally $275) Nordstrom is one of my favorite places to stock up on designer pieces, just like this shoulder bag from Kurt Geiger. The accessory is perfect for the person who likes to carry as little as possible, plus it comes with an adjustable shoulder strap, so it's completely convertible, too.Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Is there anything better than finding (read: falling in love with) a new handbag or trendy pair of sneakers, then discovering that the same product is also on sale at a fraction of its usual cost? Even after years of working as a shopping editor, I know firsthand that the "stars aligned" feeling of finding a dream style at the right price never really goes away ‚Äî especially come Black Friday, when the season's most coveted wardrobe essentials are often marked down at their lowest prices of the year.

While we're still a few weeks out from 2024's biggest shopping day, many retailers are getting in the holiday spirit early, with Black Friday sales that span the entire month of November and encompass a range of products. J.Crew is offering up to 50 percent off styles sitewide, including cozy sweaters and cardigans. Forever 21's early Black Friday sale is live, where shoppers can take 30 percent off trendy fashion staples ‚Äî like faux-leather coats and evening bags. And even Amazon unveiled a bevy of new fashion markdowns on its bestselling clothing ‚Äî including editor-loved bodysuits and Levi's jeans.

Regardless of what you're in the market for, you can save big on it right now. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best early Black Friday fashion deals. Looking for something specific? Jump to our specific categories below:

  • Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers
  • Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters
  • Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms
  • Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses
  • Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Winter Jackets
  • Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes
  • Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Update on November 13, 2024 at TK: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.

Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and
subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Mangopop Square Neck Long Sleeve Bodysuit ($20, originally $36)

There are popular Amazon styles, and then there are downright beloved pieces ‚Äî this bodysuit falls into the latter category. It's stylish yet simple, comfortable yet form-fitting, and made from a stretchy cotton and spandex blend that feels high-end, yet is still totally affordable. See how one PS editor styled the bodysuit in this Amazon bodysuits review.

Editor Quote: "The elasticity is flawless and makes for the most perfect fit. It's tight and form-fitting but hugs in all the right places. I love the square neckline, and the long sleeves make it the perfect pairing with jeans for fall. This bodysuit looks extremely similar to a bodysuit I've been eyeing that costs over $100, which makes me so happy I stumbled across this one because it's a fraction of the price." ‚Äî Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social producer

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Kidmi Suede Clogs ($40, originally $50)

These suede clogs are the epitome of fall style, with a traditional cork design that provides full support and unflinching durability. The shoes have an average 4.3 rating on Amazon, along with thousands of rave reviews that speak to their comfortable yet luxurious feel. Plus, they're one of many pieces currently marked down at Amazon's early Black Friday sale.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

BaubleBar Bubble Initial Necklace ($46, originally $58)

Treat yourself or the fashion-lover in your life to a statement necklace with a custom twist. This initial pendant can be customized directly through BaubleBar's site, and it has a cool bubble design that's so on trend this season. Shoppers can take 20 percent off the accessory through BaubleBar's early Black Friday sale, with the discount applied at checkout.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bestsellers

Happy Sailed Knit Dress ($47, originally $70)

While sweater dresses often have a tendency to be big and bulky, this knit style stands out with its fitted design and wrap silhouette. The tie-detailing makes it easy to adjust, ensuring a universally flattering fit across a range of body types. Best of all, you can wear it for so many different occasions without feeling underdressed or too over the top.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters

J.Crew Rollneck Sweater ($48, originally $98)

No winter wardrobe is complete with a statement sweater, and this cardinal-red piece is one of my favorites. Unlike turtlenecks, this style has a low rollneck design that offers enough coverage to keep you warm without feeling too constricting up top. It's available in seven fun shades, so it's easy to shop out your perfect match.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Tops and Sweaters

Abercrombie Collarless Tweed Jacket ($70, originally $140)

Ahead of Black Friday, Abercrombie just added dozens of cute pieces to its sale section ‚Äî including this striped tweed jacket, which just oozes an elegant flair. The piece offers so much styling versatility, whether you want to dress it down with jeans and loafers or style it up with boots and a cropped leather skirt for the most robust evening look.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms

Cider Woven Houndstooth High Waist Mini Skirt ($11, originally $16)

Houndstooth feels so synonymous with the fall and winter seasons, which is probably why this leggy skirt is so high on my shopping wishlist. It's great for tapping into the corpcore trend in an elevated yet accessible way. Plus, it's now 31 percent off at Cider's early Black Friday sale.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms

Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans ($31, originally $80)

Leave it to Levi's to design one of the most comfortable pairs of jeans on the market ‚Äî with the PS editor seal of approval, no less. Regardless of your preferred jean silhouette, these denim pants have a universally flattering design that works across a range of body types. Our own editor even raved about these Levi's jeans in this review of the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans.

Editor Quote: "Not to sound like a broken record, but what I love most about the Levi's Ribcage Straight Ankle Jeans is their comfort. They're stretchy, high-waisted, and slightly cropped, landing at the ankle. They're just rigid enough to have structure but soft enough that I look forward to slipping into them at the start of the day. They've become the It girl of my denim collection because they go with everything and are reliably comfortable." ‚Äî Marisa Petrarca, contributing editor, Shopping

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Bottoms

Alo 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging ($89, originally $128)

Ever dreamed of wearing the same workout essentials as Kendall and Kylie Jenner? Well, you're in luck. The sisters have been spotted wearing these cult-favorite Alo leggings on a number of occasions, and shoppers generally love the athletic pant for its sculpting design that keeps everything pulled in ‚Äî while also giving your booty a subtle lift.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses

Free People Long Game Tunic Layer ($30, originally $78)

Comfort is the name of the game this time of year, and what better style to add to your wardrobe than a breezy dress that fits like an oversize T-shirt? This Free People tunic is primed for lounging, with a flowy silhouette that's easy to move around in ‚Äî and available in two colorways.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Dresses

By Anthropologie V-Neck Velvet Mini Dress ($100, originally $188)

Holiday-party season will be here before you know it, which is why now is the perfect time to invest in a glitzy frock you can wear for all types of occasions and dress codes. Whether it's an office party or family gathering, this golden mini dress is the epitome of sophistication, with a velvet composition that's so soft. Shop the piece ‚Äî and plenty of other styles ‚Äî on sale at Anthropologie ahead of Black Friday.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and Coats

Forever 21 Faux Leather Tie-Waist Trench Coat ($35, originally $50)

Leather coats might have a reputation for being expensive, but this faux-leather style proves you can tap into the sleek trend without having to break your budget. It's equipped with a sash belt that's removable, so you can adjust and style the piece however you see fit. Plus, it's now marked down at Forever 21's early Black Friday sale.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and Coats

Lauren Ralph Lauren Quilted Coat ($110, originally $225)

Catch me donning this quilted Ralph Lauren coat all season long. The layer is crafted from an insulated polyester and faux-leather material that's designed to keep you feeling warm in even the coldest winter temperatures ‚Äî sans the usual bulky fit that comes with down jackets.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Jackets and Coats

Madewell Boiled Wool Sweater Shirt Jacket ($170, originally $198)

Is it a shirt? Is it a jacket? This unique layer combines the appeal of both pieces into one singular style that doubles as the perfect essential for transitional weather. You can wear it buttoned up on its own or teamed with a lightweight T-shirt underneath; the options are endless.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes

Steve Madden Laurely Chelsea Bootie ($45, originally $109)

If you're looking for a staple boot to don throughout the rest of the season, look no further than this Steve Madden Chelsea Boot ‚Äî a classic silhouette with endless street appeal. For as stylish as the boot is, it's also incredibly functional, with a padded foot bed that provides more support (and comfort!) than traditional ankle boots.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes

Adidas Gender Inclusive Samba OG Sneaker ($60, originally $100)

Hailed as the signature soccer shoe, Adidas Sambas sneakers have found new life this season in the streetwear category; everyone from Hailey Bieber to Bella Hadid has been spotted in the silhouette. Best of all, these classic sneakers are now marked down at Nordstrom's early Black Friday sale, so you can scoop them up at a fraction of their usual cost.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Shoes

Madewell The Greta Ballet Flat ($80, originally $98)

It doesn't get much more timeless than a ballet flat. Whether you're styling them with wide-leg jeans, satin skirts, or sweater dresses, these flats from Madewell can be paired with virtually everything in your closet ‚Äî making them the ultimate investment shoe.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Forever 21 Square Frame Sunglasses ($7, originally $10)

These frame sunglasses are the perfect dupe for other designer styles and cost less than $10 ‚Äî what's not to love? You can treat yourself to a fun new accessory or gift them as a stylish stocking stuffer.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Anthropologie Pearl Drop Earrings ($40, originally $54)

When you're not sure what to gift that person who has everything, I find that jewelry is always a safe bet. Case in point: these pearl drop earrings, which are a bit more elevated than a traditional pair of hoops, but still have a lightweight design that ensures they won't feel too heavy while you're wearing them.

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Ugg Shearling Bucket Hat ($96, originally $160)

Who says cozy Ugg styles have to be relegated to just boots and slippers? This shearling bucket hat mirrors the composition of the brand's famously cozy shoes, with a floppy frame that fits a variety of head sizes. Shop it in a chestnut or black coloring, and score it on sale at Saks Fifth Avenue's early Black Friday sale. (Use the code COLD40 to get 40 percent off.)

Early Black Friday Fashion Deals on Accessories

Kurt Geiger London Bond Croc Embossed Leather Shoulder Bag ($179, originally $275)

Nordstrom is one of my favorite places to stock up on designer pieces, just like this shoulder bag from Kurt Geiger. The accessory is perfect for the person who likes to carry as little as possible, plus it comes with an adjustable shoulder strap, so it's completely convertible, too.

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
